text: Mireya Baltra Moreno (25 February 1932 – 17 April 2022) was a Chilean sociologist, journalist and politician. She was a member of the Communist Party of Chile. She was a councillor (1963–1969) and a deputy (1969–1973) for Santiago. She was Minister of Labour and Social Welfare in Salvador Allende's government.Mireya Baltra Moreno , Library of the National Congress of Chile Baltra died on 17 April 2022 in Santiago, Chile at aged 90.Fallece Mireya Baltra, ex ministra del Trabajo del gobierno de Salvador Allende ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Writers from Santiago Category:Scientists from Santiago Category:Chilean journalists Category:South American sociologists Category:Politicians from Santiago Category:Communist politicians
